channel.title: Please help me, I guarentee it's an easy question to answer(508)
channel.description:
[b]Please[/b] help me out here? I need help on this 508 server..I need the help at the part of how to let other people play on the server. Please help :(
Thanks,
Brianna

item.title: Please help me, I guarentee it's an easy question to answer(508)
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

By using no-ip and portforwarding you allow others to connect to your computer to play. Then all you need to do is click runserver.bat.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me, I guarentee it's an easy question to answer(508)
